SA15n1242:1: sarva eva hi viśiṣṭo janaḥ śāstrārambhe sveṣṭadevatāstutiṃ kṛtavān |
SA15n1242:3: sadācārānuvṛttimātmanaḥ khyāpayansveṣṭadevatāstuteśca puṇyopacayaṃ tataśca śāstrasyāvipte parisamāptiṃ vyākhyāyāḥ śrotṛṇaṃ stutipuraḥsarayā pravṛttyā puṇyātiśayotpādanātpārārthyaṃ cālocya buddhasya bhagavataḥ stutimārabdhavān jayantītyādi |
SA15n1242:4: anena ślokena buddhasya bhagavata eva pūjā stotrataḥ |
SA15n1242:7: pūrvaṃ svārthasaṃpadaṃ bhagavato darśayati jayanti jātivyasanetyādinā sugataparyattena manastamastānavetyādinā parārthasaṃpadam |
SA15n1242:8: jayanti jayaṃ kurvanti vāca iti saṃbandhaḥ |
SA15n1242:19: rāgaśaktirādau sa ādiryeṣāṃ dveṣādīnāṃ te rāgādayo bhavatti kleśāḥ |
SA15n1242:21: yato bhagavatā sarvakleśā niḥśeṣaṃ nirdagdhā yata eva rāgādyarātirbhagavānata eva jagatastraidhātukajīvalokasya vijetā |
SA15n1242:37: tasyā hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ jagattasya jagato vijeturiti |
SA15n1242:39: yasmācchobhanādinā gato bhagavānata eva rāgādyāratiḥ yata eva nirdagdhakleśo'
SA15n1242:44: tama iti kṛtvā na gamatayā tamo'
SA15n1242:45: ndhakāro ghaṭādipratibandhaṃ karoti tathāvidyāpi viparītagrāhitayā pratibandhaṃ karoti |
SA15n1242:48: manastamasi tānavaṃ ṣaṣṭhīsamāso vā vacanapramātho draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA15n1242:49: manastamastānavamādadhānāstanutvaṃ kurvānāḥ sakalajanasya śruticittābhāvanākrameṇa sugatasya vācaḥ sūtrābhidharmavinayatripiṭakasvabhāvā jayatti |
SA15n1242:51: yasmādbhagavatpravacane pramāṇaparicchinna upāyo vimuktilakṣaṇa upeyaśca nirdiśyate teṣāṃ cāgama upāyopeyayoḥ pramāṇarahitatvāttato bhagavata eva vāco jayatti nānyeṣāmiti bhagavataḥ stutiḥ |
SA15n1242:53: bhidheyasyaiva prayojanaṃ na samyagjñānavyutpatteḥ śāstraprayojanasya prayojanam |
SA15n1242:55: sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ prayojanaṃ yena syātprayojanaprayojanaṃ tena ca prayojanaprayojanamākhyātamiti dūṣitaṃ sāmarthyāt |
SA15n1242:56: atha kasmātprakaraṇasyābhidheyaprayojanami tyevamuktaṃ na punaḥ prakaraṇasya śarīraprayojanamityāha dvividhaṃ hītyāhi |
SA15n1242:57: yato dvividhaṃ prakaraṇasya śarīraṃ prakaraṇasya svabhāvaḥ tasmādabhidheyeti viśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtam |
SA15n1242:58: nanu yathābhidheyasya prayojanaṃ cintyate tathā śabdasyāpi kimiti na cintyata ityāha tatretyādi |
SA15n1242:66: nanu ca yatrābhidheyaprayojanaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttāvaṅgaṃ tathā saṃbandhādīnyapi |
SA15n1242:67: atastāni kimiti na kathyanta ityāha asminnabhidheyaprayojane kathite tānyapi sāmarthyātkathitāni bhavantītyarthaḥ |
SA15n1242:72: abhidheyaprayojanameva sākṣādvācyatayā nirdiśyate abhidheyādīni tu tadviśeṣaṇatayā |
SA15n1242:75: na caikena vākyenārthatrayaṃ sākṣācchakyate darśayitumiti darśayati natvidamityādi |
SA15n1242:76: ekaṃ tvityādi vākyaṃ prādhānyenaikaṃ vadadabhidheyavyutpattiprayojanasaṃbandhārthatrayaṃ pratipādayati tatra tadityādinā |
SA15n1242:78: nanu ca tadyutpattiḥ kriyata ityevaṃ yujyate vaktuṃ kimiti tadyutpādyata iti ṇicā nirdeśa iti |
SA15n1242:80: atreti prakaraṇe vakturiti śāstrakartuḥ śrotuśca prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ cintyate |
SA15n1242:81: yasmāddvayorapi vaktṛśrotrostatra prakaraṇe prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇākhyo vyāpārau staḥ |
SA15n1242:82: kimiti punastayoḥ karaṇaśravaṇayoḥ prayojanaṃ cintyata ityāha tathāhītyādi |
SA15n1242:83: tata ācāryeṇetyādinā dvayorvyāpārasya prayojanaṃ darśayati yasmādanena samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyata ityatra vākye vyutpattikriyāniṣpattau karaṇaśravaṇakriyādvayakartavyatayā praviṣṭam |
SA15n1242:84: tacca vyutpattikaraṇaṃ śāstrakārasyaiva nānyasyeti ṇicā nidarśitam |
SA15n1242:85: yasmātsamyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyamānāñśiṣyānprerayati vyutpāditaṃ samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyadhvamityātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartumārabdhaṃ prakaraṇam |
SA15n1242:86: tasmādvaktureva karaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ vyutpādanaṃ na bhājanādīnām |
SA15n1242:87: yadyapi tairvinā vyutpādanaṃ na bhavati tathāpi na tāni vyutpādakāni teṣāṃ śiṣyaviṣaye prerakatvābhāvāt |
SA15n1242:88: śiṣyaiścetyādi yasmācchiṣyā ācāryaprayuktāṃ vyutpattimātmanaḥ saṃbandhinīṃ kartumicchatti yataste pracodyāstasmāttatprakaraṇaṃ taiḥ śrūyata iti śravaṇasya prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam |
SA15n1242:90: anyathāsādharaṇavyāpāro vakturvyutpattau na darśitaḥ syāt śiṣyāṇaṃ ca śravaṇavyāpāraśca |
SA15n1242:91: yasmātsarva evaṃ prayojakaparatantro bhavati asati ṇici śiṣyā aprayojyāḥ ye cāprayojyāḥ te svatantrāḥ svatantrāṇāṃ cācāryaprayuktāṃ vyutpattimanicchatāṃ śravaṇabhāvātkathaṃ śravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ cintyata iti sthitam |
SA15n1242:92: nanu ca yathābhidheyavyutpādanaprayojanayorapoddhāreṇa pratipādakapadaṃ kathaṃ saṃbandhasyāpi kimiti na kathitamityāha saṃbandhapradarśanapadaṃ tvityādi |
SA15n1242:93: ayameva prakaraṇaviśeṣo laghūpāyatayā vakṣyamāṇayā nītyopāyo vyutpādanamupeyam |
SA15n1242:95: sa ca pratīyata iti na padāntareṇa kathitaḥ |
SA15n1242:99: evamādivākyenābhidheyaprayojanādau kathite sati prāmāṇikānāṃ pravṛttau tadasaṃgatameveti manyamānaścodayati nanvityādinā |
SA15n1242:101: yo hi prāmāṇikaḥ sa pramāṇe pravartate |
SA15n1242:102: na cādivākye prayojanādinā kathitena śāstraśravaṇātprāgvartate śāstraṃ ādivākyasyāprāmāṇyāt |
SA15n1242:108: yadyasyāpramāṇaṃ prayojanapratipādakamādivacanaṃ tathāpi śāstrādau pratipādanīyaṃ arthasaṃśayajananārtham |
SA15n1242:109: yo hi samyagjñānārthī sa tathābhūta śāstrakarturādivākyaṃ śrutvā tatra saṃśete saṃśayācca pravartata iti tātparyam |
SA15n1242:110: ata eveti yata evādivākyenārthasaṃśayaḥ saṃśayācca pravṛttirata eva śāstrakāreṇaiva yujyate vaktuṃ nākhyānakartreti |
SA15n1242:111: tena yaduktaṃ kenacidyākhyānakārā eva prayojanādīni pratipādayiṣyantīti tatpratyuktam |
SA15n1242:113: yadyapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti mahatā prabandhane śāstrakaraṇātsaṃbhāvyata ityarthaḥ |
SA15n1242:114: nanu ca bādhakasādhakapramāṇābhāvātsamyagjñānavyutpattyathī vināpyādivacanena saṃśayānastatra pravartata iti kimādivākyena tatroktenetyāha anukteṣvityādi |
SA15n1242:117: yo hi kākadattaparīkṣādiśāstraṃ dṛṣṭvā prayojanādirahitaṃ atrāpyaprayojanādīnsaṃbhāvayannanarthaṃ saṃśete anarthasaṃśayācca na pravartate taṃ pratyetatkathanasya prayojanam |
SA15n1242:118: kathite ca vacane śāstrakāreṇa tadanurodhādvacanādarthasaṃśayo jāyate tataḥ pravartata ityarthaḥ |
SA15n1242:120: ato vā prakaraṇadanyasya prakaraṇasya laghutaropāyatāṃ saṃbhāvyāsya prakaraṇasyāsāratayā anupāyatā syādityarthaḥ |
SA15n1242:121: evaṃ samudāyena vākyasyaṃ tātparyaṃ vyākhyāyāvayavārthaṃ darśayitumāha avisaṃvādakamityādi |
SA15n1242:122: avisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānamiti bruvatā ṭīkākṛtārthāvabodhakaṃ jñānaṃ mīmāṃsakaparikalpitamarthadarśanaṃ ca cārvākopakalpitamathāpi viparītaṃ jñānaṃ kaiścitparikalpitaṃ samyaktvena tannirastaṃ sarvaṃ eteṣāṃ samyagjñānalakṣaṇābhāvāt |
SA15n1242:123: yathā ca na tāni samyagjñānāni tathā svayaṃ ṭīkāyāmapahastitāni |
SA15n1242:124: ekasminnevārthe trayāṇāṃ jñānānāṃ pradarśakapravartakaprāpakabhedena prāmāṇyamiṣṭaṃ pareṇa |
SA15n1242:126: pradarśite cārtha prathamena darśakena jñānena yaddvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivārthe puruṣasya pravartakaṃ tṛtīyamapi tatraivārthe prāpakaṃ tato nādyādadhikaṃ prāpaṇayogyīkaraṇeneti tadeva pramāṇam |
SA15n1242:131: yatpradarśakamādāvutpannamarthe jñānaṃ tadeva pravṛttiviṣayaṃ karoti pravṛttiviṣayayogyīkarotītyarthaḥ |
SA15n1242:132: na tu dvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ ādyenaiva pravṛttiviṣayayogyīkṛtatvāt |
SA15n1242:135: kuto'yaṃ labhyate yadā prathamaṃ darśayatyeva na pravartayati na prāpayati |
SA15n1242:140: nanu ca yadyapyarthādhigatireva pramāṇaphalaṃ tathāpi yāvaduttare pravartakaprāpakajñāne na bhavatastatrārthe tāvanna pramāṇavyāpāraparisamāptirityāha adhigata ityādi |
SA15n1242:142: adhigate cārthe samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāra iti tayoḥ prāmāṇye kartavye'
SA15n1242:147: sa ca niścayaḥ prathamayā cārthādhigatvā kṛta iti samāpto vyāpārastāvataiva puruṣasya pravṛtteḥ |
SA15n1242:151: pravartitaḥ puruṣa iti pravartanayogyatvātpravartita ityucyate prāpaṇayogyatvātprāpitaḥ |
SA15n1242:152: evaṃ sāmānyena saṃvādakaṃ samyagjñānaṃ pratipādya viśeṣeṇa ca pratyakṣānumāṇe svavyāpāraṃ kurvatī samyagjñāne bhavata iti darśayannāha tatra yo'
SA15n1242:161: tacca vahnyavyabhicāridhūmaniścayanaṃ sāmanyena sādhyāvinābhāvi ca smaraṇajñānam |
SA15n1242:162: yathā dhūmaṃ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītvā sarvatrāyaṃ vahnija iti smaraṇaṃ tasmātliṅgajñānānniścinvatpravṛttiviṣayaṃ darśayati |
SA15n1242:163: tadanumānaṃ viśiṣṭasaṃbandhena yadudeti jñānaṃ yathātratyo dhūmo vahnija iti jñānam |
SA15n1242:166: anumānasya tu liṅgadarśanātsvaviṣaye niścayātmanotpattireva niścayavyāpāra iti |
SA15n1242:169: nānyadvijñānamityevaṃ bruvataite eva samyagjñāne nānyāni śabdādīni teṣāṃ niyatārthānupadarśakatvāditi samyagjñānasya pravṛttiḥ darśitā |
SA15n1242:170: yathaite pramāṇe saṃśayādijñānaṃ na tathā pramāṇam |
SA15n1242:173: yathā pratyakṣānumāne svena svena pramāṇenopadarśitārthasya prāpake na tathā saṃśayaviparyayajñāne tathābhūtasyārthasyābhāvāditi |
SA15n1242:174: nanu ca mā bhūtsaṃśayaviparyayajñānayoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ tathābhūtasyārthasyāsattvāditi yatpunariha kūpe jalamiti jñānaṃ tatpramāṇāntaraṃ kimiti na bhavati na tāvatpratyakṣaṃ tatra jalasya parokṣatvāt |
SA15n1242:180: yadyapi sākṣātsaṃśayajñānaṃ na pratīyate yastu saṃśayaḥ vikalpakasya jñānasya iha kūpe jalamityevaṃjātīyasya tathāpi niyāmakaṃ liṅgamattareṇa tadapramāṇaṃ niyatārthaparicchedāt |
SA15n1242:182: yatpunastatra pravṛttena kadācijjalaṃ labhyate tajjñānāntarāditi viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ pratipāditam |
SA15n1242:183: nanu ca yadyapi saṃśayādīnāmupadarśitārthasya prāpakatvaṃ nāsti kiṃ tāni na vyutpādyanta ityāha arthakriyārthibhiścetyādi |
SA15n1242:185: nanu ca yadyupadarśitārthaprāpaṇātpramāṇaṃ samyagjñānaṃ śuklaśaṅkhe pītajñānaṃ kuñcikāvivare maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇijñānaṃ ardharātre madhyāhnakālavastugrāhi svaprajñānaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ prāpnotītyebhirupadarśitasyārthamātrasya prāptestataśca samyagjñānamityāśaṅkyāha arthādhigamātmakaṃ hītyādi |
SA15n1242:187: ebhirupadarśitasyārthasya pītākārasya kuñcikāvivarasthasya maṇerniyatadeśasya niyatakālasya cārdharātre'
SA15n1242:188: prāpaṇāt deśakālavyatiriktasyāvayavāderabhāvāt ata eva tānyapramāṇānyeva na samyagjñānānīti |
SA15n1242:192: deśākārābhyāṃ niyatasya prāptuṃ śakyatvādbhavatvanyākārasyānyadeśasya ca prāptāvapramāṇam |
SA15n1242:199: styeva kiṃ tu kṣaṇāpekṣayā na prāmāṇyalakṣaṇamucyate api tu saṃtānāpekṣayā |
SA15n1242:200: tataśca nīlādau ya eva saṃtānaḥ paricchinno nīlajñānena sa eva tena prāpitaḥ |
SA15n1242:202: na tathā sthūlakālabhedena pradarśitasya putrasya svaprajñānam |
SA15n1242:205: sa ca hetuhetumadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavati yadi saṃtānāpekṣayā prāmāṇyamavatiṣṭhate na kṣaṇāpekṣayeti |
SA15n1242:207: kathaṃ pūrvaśabdaḥ kāraṇe vartata ityāha kāryādityādi |
SA15n1242:208: kāraṇaśabda eva kasmānna kṛta ityāha kāraṇaśabda ityādi |
SA15n1242:209: kimanantarakāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ saṃbhavati yadapekṣayā vyavahitasya grahaṇārthaṃ pūrvaśabdagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamityāha dvividhamityādi nanu kimucyate arthakriyānirbhāsaṃ jñānamanantaraṃ kāraṇaṃ naṃ hi tatkāraṇajñānaṃ kiṃ tarhi phalajñānam |
SA15n1242:210: evaṃ tu yujyate vaktuṃ yatsādhananirbhāsyanantaraṃ jñānamarthakriyānirbhāsajñānamupajanayati tatsādhanajñānamanantarakāraṇamityucyate |
SA15n1242:213: arthakriyā yā nirbhāsaḥ pratibimbanaṃ tadākārajñānotpattiryasmādanantarajñānāttatsādhanajñānaṃ tadarthakriyānirbhāsaṃ sādhanajñānam |
SA15n1242:216: yadyevamanantarameva kimiti na parīkṣyata ityāha yatraiva hītyādi |
SA15n1242:218: rthakriyāsamarthavastupravartake puruṣasya saṃdehastadeva parīkṣyate na cānattarasādhanajñāne saṃdehastadanattaraṃ sukhaduḥkhapratibhāsajñānodayāt |
SA15n1242:219: tayoranubhave sati sādhanajñānātpravartituṃ vā yujyata iti na parīkṣāhaṃ yadvārthakriyānirbhāsasyānayā yuktyā na parīkṣārhatvamiti |
SA15n1242:225: tena hyevaṃ vyākhyātaṃ arthaśabdena prayojanamucyate puruṣasya prayojanaṃ dārupākādi |
SA15n1242:229: dharmottaravyākhyāne tu heyopādeyārthaviṣayā yā siddhiranuṣṭhitiḥ sā samyagjñānapūrviketi na doṣaḥ |
SA15n1242:233: tasya kimiti na kathanamityāha na ca heyetyādi |
SA15n1242:238: tena yaduktaṃ kaiścidveyopādeyayoḥ puruṣārthopayogitvātkathanaṃ upekṣaṇīyasya tadviparyayānna kathanamiti tatpratyuktam |
SA15n1242:240: uttareṇa granthena sarvaśabda ityādinā ṭīkākṛtāṃ vyākhyāṃ dūṣayati |
SA15n1242:243: na tu sarvā hānopādānārthasiddhiḥ samyagjñānādevāpi tu mithyājñānādapi kākatālīyetyāśaṅkā parihṛtam |
SA15n1242:252: tra draṣṭavyaḥ kārtsnye vartate sarvaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭamiti |
SA15n1242:253: tenāyamarthaḥ yāvatī kṛtsnārthasiddhirhānopādānalakṣaṇā sarvā samyagjñānādeva na mithyājñānāt mithyājñānādarthaprāptyasiddheriti |
SA15n1242:255: dviprakārāpītyādinā paravyākhyāṃ darśayati api tvayamartha ityādinātmīṣāṃ vyākhyām |
SA15n1242:256: tato yāvadbrūyādi tyādinopasaṃhāravyājenaivaśabdena prayuktenāvadhāraṇārthavācinā yāvānarthastāvāneva sarvaśabdena prayuktena kṛtsnārthavācinā bhavatīti darśayati |
SA15n1242:257: nanu bahuvrīhiṇā puruṣārthasiddhirucyate tasyāḥ prādhānyāttacchabdena saṃbandho yukto na samyagjñānasyetyāha yadyapītyādi |
SA15n1242:262: nanu ca kimidaṃ jñānasya vyutpādanaṃ kiṃ jñānasyotpādanamuta doṣāpanayanamatha svanūpakathanamiti |
SA15n1242:267: nāpi svanūpakathanaṃ yujyate niṣprayojanatvātprakaraṇasyetyāśaṅkyāha vyutpādyata iti vipratipattinirākaraṇeneti |
SA15n1242:272: tāmeva vipratipattiṃ krameṇa darśayati catuḥprakārā saṃkhyālakṣaṇetyādinā |
SA15n1242:275: tathā hi mīmāṃsakāḥ pratyakṣānumānaśabdopamānārthāpattyabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ padavyākhyāyuktaṃ samyagjñānaṃ manyatte |
SA15n1242:279: nanu ca samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇe kathite sati paścāttadbhedaḥ pradarśayituṃ yujyate itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇaṃ samyagjñānaṃ dvividhamiti tatkimityādāveva pradarśitamityāha vyaktibhede cetyādi |
SA15n1242:282: kathite samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇameva na śakyate kathayituṃ yataḥ pratyakṣasyānyatlakṣaṇamanumānasya cānyat |
SA15n1242:283: saṃkhyābhede tu kathite lakṣaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ śakyate kathayitumityato lakṣaṇāṅgamevādau saṃkhyābhedakathanamiti |
SA15n1242:284: nanu ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ceti nirdeśāddvividhamiti labdham |
SA15n1242:287: dvividhameva samyagjñānamityavadhāraṇārthaṃ tenaikatricaturā saṃkhyā nirastā syāt |
SA15n1242:294: tataśca pratyakṣā buddhiḥ pratyakṣo ghaṭa iti na syāt |
SA15n1242:295: idameva syātpratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kuṇḍaṃ ceti |
SA15n1242:297: nanu ca pratigatamakṣamityasyāṃ vyutpattāvakṣāśritasyaivendriyajñānasya pratyakṣaśabdavācyatā syāt na yogijñānādeiḥ teṣāmakṣānāśrayādityāśaṅkyāha akṣāśritatvaṃ cetyādi |
SA15n1242:302: atrāpi paścānmānamanumānami tyavyapībhāvasamāse pūrvavajrodyamudrāvya gatisamāsa āśrayitavyaḥ |
SA15n1242:303: anugataṃ mānamanumānamiti paścādityarthakathanaṃ kṛtaṃ na tasminvākye samāsaḥ |
SA15n1242:304: cakāraḥ pratyakṣānumānayostulyabalatvaṃ samuccinotītyādinā yaduktaṃ śabarasvāmiprabhṛtibhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pramāṇaṃ nānumānaṃ tathā coktaṃ mīmāṃsabhāṣye pratyakṣe balīyasi kathamanumānamiti tatpratyuktaṃ yato dvayorapi svavyāpāre tulyabalatvam |
SA15n1242:312: etaccāyuktaṃ yasmādekavibhaktinirdeśe kriyāmāṇe cakāreṇa tulyabalatvaṃ na pradarśitaṃ syāditi |
SA15n1242:316: anena lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyākhyānaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhanūpaṃ pratyuktam |
SA15n1242:319: yadyapyanvarthasaṃjñayā kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yadbhrāntaṃ ca tatpratyakṣamiti śakyate yathārthaṃ kathayituṃ tathāpi na svanūpaṃ pratyakṣasya kathitaṃ syāt yato'
SA15n1242:320: nyadapi pratyakṣasya svanūpamarthasākṣātkārādikamastīti lakṣyalakṣaṇe tu yathārthaṃ kathite kathitaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1242:322: ata eva na lakṣaṇakaraṇaṃ saṃjñākaraṇaṃ bhavati saṃjñākaraṇatvenāpratīterlakṣaṇakaraṇasya |
SA15n1242:323: śabdamanūdyānityatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate na cānityatvaṃ saṃjñeti gamyata iti saṃjñālakṣaṇakaraṇayorbhedaḥ |
SA15n1242:324: yastvanayoḥ pradeśāntaraprasiddhayoranuvādaṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣatvaṃ vidadhāti tenāpyatra lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo viparītamākhyātaṃ bhaṅgyā yato lakṣaṇavidhānakāle lakṣyamanūdya lakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate na tu lakṣaṇamanūdya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate |
SA15n1242:325: siddhe tu lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāve sati lakṣaṇamanūdya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate yathā yaḥ śikhāvānsa parivrājaka iti |
SA15n1242:326: śikhālakṣaṇavidhānakāle tu parivrājakānuvādena śikhaiva vidhīyate na viparītavidhānamityanyadapyasminyakṣe dūṣaṇaṃ dattaṃ viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ ṭīkākṛteti tatraiva draṣṭavyam |
SA15n1242:327: nanu ca lakṣaṇavidhipakṣe pratyakṣasyādyāpyasiddhatvādanūdyaṃ na saṃbhavati tataśca kathaṃ pratyakṣalakṣyamanūdya lakṣaṇaṃ vijñāpyate |
SA15n1242:328: yathā śikhayā prarivrājaka ityitra śikhālakṣaṇamanūdya kalpanāpoḍhādi vidhīyata ityāśaṅkyāha yattadbhavatāmityādi |
SA15n1242:330: yadyapi kalpanāpoḍhatvena pratyakṣaṃ na prasiddhaṃ tathāpyarthasākṣātkāritvena sāmānyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasiddham |
SA15n1242:332: nanu ca tayoraprasiddhatvātpratyakṣasyāprasiddhireva pratyakṣasya tatsvabhāvatvādityāśaṅkyāha na caitanmantavyamityādi subodham |
SA15n1242:342: etacca lakṣaṇadvayamityādinā padadvayena vipratipattinirāsaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyākhyā padadvayavyavacchedakathananūpā dūṣitā |
SA15n1242:345: evaṃ satyanumānasyāpi pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ tannivṛttyartham |
SA15n1242:346: yadyevaṃ vyākhyāyate ālambane yanna bhrāntaṃ tadabhrāntamityevamucyamāne sarvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānamālambane bhrāntamiti na kasyacitpratyakṣatvaṃ syāt | tathā cāha |
SA15n1242:349: na tadapyatrācāryeṇa saṃgṛhītamiti tadayuktaṃ yata ācāryeṇa vipratipattinirāsārthaṃ padadvayaṃ kṛtaṃ na vyavacchedārtham |
SA15n1242:352: pi kimiti vyavacchedārthaṃ na bhavatītyāha etaccetyādi |
SA15n1242:356: api tvarthakriyākṣame vastunūpa ālambane yanna bhrāmyati tadabhrāntaśabdena gṛhyate |
SA15n1242:360: yogācāramatena tvabhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyaṃ saṃvādakasya samyagjñānasya prastutatvāt anyavyāvartyasyābhāvāt |
SA15n1242:365: yathā nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ tathā jātyādiyojanājñānamapi samyagjñānamindriyajaṃ upadarśitasyārthasya prāpaṇāt |
SA15n1242:373: na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamarśinī ||
SA15n1242:374: na so'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte |
SA15n1242:376: tathā naiyāyikādīnāṃ savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣamiti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirākriyate |
SA15n1242:378: bhrāntagrahaṇamatiricyamānaṃ dvicandrajñānādeḥ samyagjñānādhikaraṇa evaṃ nirastatvādvipratipattinirāsārthatvameva bhavati |
SA15n1242:379: tathācāryaikadeśīyāḥ śukle śaṅkhe pītajñānaṃ gacchadvṛkṣadarśanajñānaṃ cālātacakrajñānamabhrāntamapi samyagjñānamicchanti vastuno'
SA15n1242:383: tathā sati abhrāntagrahaṇa ityādinābhrāntaśabdasya vipratipattiviṣayaṃ darśayati |
SA15n1242:390: bhrāntārtha iti tasyārthasya grahaṇe doṣaṃ darśayati na tvavisaṃvādakamityādinā |
SA15n1242:391: kīdṛśī punaḥ kalpanetyādinā kalpanābahutvātkasyāḥ kalpanāyāḥ grahaṇamiti kalpanāviśeṣamajñānanpṛcchati |
SA15n1242:392: tathā hi vaibhāṣikā indriyavijñānaṃ vitarkavicāracaitasikasaṃprayuktaṃ kalpanāmicchanti |
SA15n1242:393: yogācāramatena ca tathāgatajñānamadvayaṃ muktvā sarvajñānaṃ grāhyagrāhakatvena vikalpitaṃ kalpanā |
SA15n1242:395: abhilāpetyādinā śabdasaṃsṛṣṭasya vikalpasya grahaṇaṃ nāgamaparipaṭhitānāmiti darśayati |
SA15n1242:399: tena vinītadevavyākhyā dūṣitā abhilapyata ityabhilāpaḥ vācyaḥ sāmānyādirityevaṃnūpā |
SA15n1242:400: evamevedamāśrayaṇīyamanyathā yogyagrahaṇena śabdasaṃsargayogyo na kathitaḥ syāditi |
SA15n1242:401: yadyevaṃ dharmottaravyākhyāne jātyādervācyasya saṃsargabhāvo na pradarśitaḥ syāt |
SA15n1242:405: nanu ca yadyapi tasmiñjñāna ākārayormīlanaṃ tathāpi śabdārthayoḥ saṃsargo nāstītyāha |
SA15n1242:411: nanu cāvyutpannasaṃketasya bālamūkāderanumato vijñāne na śabdasaṃsarga iti tadyotyatvamapi nāsti |
SA15n1242:420: tataśca vyāvartyābhāvādyogyagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamityāśaṅkāṃ parasya darśayati asatyabhilāpetyadinā |
SA15n1242:432: nanu ca bālasya tālvādikaraṇapāṭavābhāve sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdoccāraṇaṃ nāsti tatkimucyate sa evāyamiti |
SA15n1242:433: satyaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu sa evāyamityanena vikalpasyāvasthocyate |
SA15n1242:438: bālasyāpi pūrvāparaparāmarśanūpaṃ vikalpakaṃ vijñānamasti niyataviṣaye pravṛtteḥ yathā gṛhītasaṃketasya pūrvāparaparāmarśena pravṛttiriti |
SA15n1242:440: tadaniyatapratibhāsaṃ pūrvāparayorāropitatvāditi saṃsargayogyaṃ bālamūkādervijñānamiti tannivṛttyartha yogyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti sthitam |
SA15n1242:441: indriyavijñānamityādinā kumārilena yadindriyavijñānasyālocanākhyasya bālamūkādivijñānena sādṛśyaṃ pratipāditaṃ taddūṣayitumupasaṃhāravyājena vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati |
SA15n1242:443: ata eva svalakṣaṇasyāpi śabdasyārthasya ca vācyavācakatvamabhyupagamya nirvikalpakatvamindriyavijñānasya sādhyate |
SA15n1242:446: yadyapītyanena svalakṣaṇayorvācyavācakabhāvābhyupagamaṃ darśayati paramārthataḥ sāmānyayoreva vācyavācakatvaṃ nārthaśabdaviśeṣasyetyādinā nyāyena |
SA15n1242:452: tena yadvinītadevena sāmānyayorvāghyavācakabhāvamaṅgīkṛtya nirvikalpakatvamindriyavijñānasya pratipāditaṃ taddūṣitaṃ bhaṅgyā |
SA15n1242:457: yadā ghaṭaśabdaḥ śabdaśabdo vā śabdaṃ śabdena pratipadyate tadā kiṃcidvācyaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ kiṃcidvācakaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇamiti |
SA15n1242:458: tataḥ śruddhayoḥ śravaṇe sati śabdavijñāne dvayorapi śabdayoḥ pratibhāsanācchrotrendriyajñānamaniyatapratibhāsitvātsavikalpakaṃ syādityākūtam |
SA15n1242:461: yadyapi svalakṣaṇayorvācyavācakatvaṃ tathāpi śrotravijñāne na vācyavācakatayā tayoḥ pratibhāsanaṃ api tu śuddhayoreva pratibhāsanaṃ yasmācchabdasaṃnidhibalena śrotravijñānamutpadyate |
SA15n1242:463: yāvatsaṃketakālabhāviśabdasmaraṇaṃ na bhavati tāvatkuto vācyatvaṃ vācakatvaṃ vā syāt etatpratyabhijñayā sa evāyaṃ vācako bhaviṣyatītyāha |
SA15n1242:466: kaśca saṃketaviṣayaḥ śabdo yaḥ saṃketakālabhāvinā jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ |
SA15n1242:467: yaśca pūrvajñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ sa idānīṃ nāsti pūrvajñānavināśe pūrvajñānaviṣayatvasyābhāvāt |
SA15n1242:469: yogijñānena yadyekasminkāle manovijñānena ca yugapacchandārthau gṛhīte tathāpi saṃnihitavastutayā tena gṛhītavyāviti darśayati |
SA15n1242:471: nanu kalpanājñānamapi parayā kalpanayā śūnyaṃ tataśca tasyāpi nirvikalpakatvaṃ prāpnotītyāśaṅkyāha |
SA15n1242:475: tra kalpanātvaṃ lakṣyate yathā viṣāṇītyatra viṣāṇitvaṃ tataśca kalpanātvena rahitaṃ yajjñānaṃ tannirvikalpakam |
SA15n1242:477: kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntatvayorlakṣaṇayoḥ parasparaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvaṃ na svātantryeṇa pṛthaglakṣaṇatvamiti darśayitumante pratyakṣaśabdaṃ gṛhītvā tayorapi saṃbadhnāti tatpratyakṣamiti pareṇa saṃbandha ityanena |
SA15n1242:486: bāhyā nauḥ sevāśrayastatra sthitasyāśrayadvārako vibhrama ucyate |
SA15n1242:490: nānyairindriyamagatairindriyaṃ vikriyāṃ gatamityāha sarvairevetyādi timirasya sākṣādalātādeḥ pāramparyeṇeti etacca viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ vistareṇa pratipāditamiti |
SA15n1242:491: saṃkṣobhapadena saha dvandvaṃ kṛtvā bahuvrīhiriti darśayati viniścaye tu saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaṃ kṛtvādiśabdena bahuvrīhisamāsa darśayataḥ ko'
SA15n1242:494: yadā saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ tadāśrayagatasya vibhramakāraṇasyopalakṣaṇatvādvātapittādergrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti nārthabhedaḥ |
SA15n1242:495: atha kimarthamāśubhramaṇagrahaṇāderupādānaṃ timirādītyeva kriyatāmādigrahaṇena sarveṣāṃ saṃgraho bhaviṣyati |
SA15n1242:499: teṣāmupādāne padyādigrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta tadā teṣāṃ svanūpagrahaṇameva syāt |
SA15n1242:501: tata ubhayopādāne sati timirādīnāmubhayakātsyarna labhyata iti sthitam |
SA15n1242:502: tat tathāvidhaṃ jñānamiti yadyapi sūtre jñānagrahaṇaṃ nāsti tathāpi bhrānte jñānadharmatvāttadyudāsena jñānameva pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyata ityadoṣaḥ |
SA15n1242:503: vinītadevavyākhyāyāṃ bhavati tu pratyakṣasūtrasyārthakathanaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti tasmātsthitaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣabhrāntamiti ||
SA15n1242:506: mānase ca pratyakṣe doṣa udbhāvita iti dvābhyāṃ bhikṣavo nūpaṃ dṛśyate cakṣurvijñānena tadākṛṣṭena manovijñāneneti tadāgamasiddhaṃ manovijñānamācāryadignāgena pratyakṣaṃ darśitaṃ tatparaiḥ kumārilādibhirlakṣaṇamajñānadbhirdūṣitam |
SA15n1242:507: tanmanojñānaṃ yadīndriyavijñānaviṣaye pravartate tadā gṛhītagrāhitayāpramāṇaṃ athānyaviṣaye pravartate vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ bhavatkiṃ tanmanovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣaṃ syānnirāpekṣaṃ vā |
SA15n1242:508: indriyasavyapekṣatve satīndiyavijñānameva nirāpekṣatve vānindriyasyāpi manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syādityandhabadhirādyabhāvacodya kṛtam |
SA15n1242:509: svasaṃvedanaṃ ca nābhyupagatamiti mīmāṃsakaiḥ parokṣaṃ vijñānamarthāpattigamyaṃ pratyakṣo'
SA15n1242:511: naiyāyikādibhistu jñānāntaragamyaṃ jñānamiṣyate na svasaṃvedanaṃ siddhaṃ svātmani kāritvavirodhāt |
SA15n1242:514: yogina eva na saṃprati pramāṇābhāvāt kiṃ punaḥ teṣāṃ jñānamiti indriyāśritamiti cakṣurādīndriyacatuṣṭayaṃ gṛhyate |
SA15n1242:515: na mana indriyaṃ tasya svasaṃvedanapratyakṣe pratipādyamānatvāt |
SA15n1242:516: indriyāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti bruvatā thismuc vārtikakṛtā na cakṣuḥ pramāṇamiti kathitaṃ bhavati yasmājjñānasyaivānvayavyatirekānuvidhānādrūpādidarśane sāmarthyaṃ na cakṣuṣaḥ |
SA15n1242:517: yatūktaṃ jñānaṃ cetpaśyati vyavahitamapi kiṃ na paśyati amūrtasyāvācakābhāvāditi tadayuktaṃ yato yogyadeśenaivārthena tajjñānaṃ janyate na vyavahitena vijñānādarśanāt |
SA15n1242:519: tasyānāntara ityasya vivaraṇaṃ na vidyata ityādi |
SA15n1242:525: nanu ca kathaṃ viṣayakṣaṇasya sahakāritvamekasminkṣaṇe upakāryopakārakabhāvābhāvādityata āha dvividhaścetyādi |
SA15n1242:530: yadā yogijñānaṃ parasyaivaṃvidhajñānamālambate tadālambanabhūtena yogijñānaṃ janyata iti |
SA15n1242:532: samanantara iti ca bhavati śakandhvādiṣu pāṭhāt paranūpatvaṃ yataḥ sa ceti samanantaraḥ hetutvāditi pratyayārthakathanametat |
SA15n1242:534: indriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇopādānabhūtena yajjanitaṃ tadeva manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na ālambanabhūtena janitamityarthaḥ |
SA15n1242:535: yadā cetyādinā dvayorekaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhītvā yañcoditaṃ pareṇa tatparihṛtaṃ pūrvakṣaṇa indriyavijñānasya viṣayo dvitīyakṣaṇe manovijñānasya viṣaya ityagṛhītagrāhi manovijñānamiti |
SA15n1242:536: yadā cetyādinā yaccodyaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi manovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣaṃ na syānmanovijñānasyendriyavijñānaviṣayādanyo viṣayaḥ tadāndhabadirādyabhāvaḥ vyavahitasya nīlādergrahaṇaṃ bhavatviti tatparihṛtam |
SA15n1242:537: yasmādindriyavijñānaviṣayasya dvitīyopādeyabhūtaviṣayakṣaṇo gṛhīto manovijñānaviṣayaḥ tasmādyavahitakṣaṇo viṣayo na bhavatyasyāndhabadirādeścātīndriyavijñānam |
SA15n1242:539: tena teṣāṃ na manovijñānaṃ bhavatīti parihṛtam |
SA15n1242:542: anyathā pañca bāhyā vijñeyā ityasya vyāghātaḥ syāt |
SA15n1242:543: svaviṣayānantaraviṣayaśabdena śrotravijñānaviṣayānantarayogyaviṣayo gṛhyate nopādeyakṣaṇa eva tena vijñānaviṣayadeśe'
SA15n1242:544: paraśabdo yadotpadyate tadā mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā janitaṃ bhavatītyadoṣaḥ |
SA15n1242:547: yadā cakṣurviṣayamālocyoparataṃ bhavati tadālocanāviṣaye cakṣurvijñānamutpannaṃ satpunardvitīye kṣaṇa ātmīyaviṣayānantaraviṣayenotpādyata indriyāṇāṃ tatra vyāpārābhāvāt |
SA15n1242:548: tataśca tenendriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā mānasapratyakṣamutpadyata iti sthitam |
SA15n1242:549: nanvekasminkṣaṇe tasyotpādake sati na tatra kācidarthakriyāvāpyata iti puruṣārthānupayogitvātprāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti |
SA15n1242:552: te ca tasminkṣaṇe mānase copadarśitaṃ viṣayaṃ pratipadya dharmadeśanādikāmarthakriyāmāsādayantītyinavadyam |
SA15n1242:553: atha vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi kimiti mānasotpattirlupyata ityāha vyāpāravatityādi sarvendriyāśritaṃ jñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānameva na mānasasyotpattirastītyabhiprāyaḥ |
SA15n1242:554: nanu vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi prathame kṣaṇa indriyavijñānaṃ bhavati dvitīye kṣaṇe mānasaṃ bhavati yadyapi samānajātīyayoryugapadutpattirnāstītyāha itarathetyādi |
SA15n1242:556: vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi kimitīndriyavijñānaṃ notpadyate dvitīye kṣaṇe yogyakaraṇe sati samānanūpaṃ tena tayoḥ kathamindriyavijñānavyapadeśo na syāditi |
SA15n1242:557: nanu ca yadi mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ indriyajñānādbhinnaṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhaṃ bhavettadā tasya lakṣaṇaṃ yāvatā pramāṇasiddhameva nāstītyāha etaccetyādi |
SA15n1242:558: evaṃjātīyakamitīndriyavijñānasadṛśaṃ tadetaddharmottareṇāgamasiddhaṃ darśayatācāryajñānagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mānasasiddhaye yatpramāṇamupanyastaṃ vikalpodayāditi tadbhaṅgyāvadhāraṇādeva dūṣitam |
SA15n1242:559: tairevaṃ vyākhyātaṃ vyāpāravati cakṣuṣīndriyajñānamutpadyate mānasaṃ ca |
SA15n1242:561: yataḥ samānendriyayornāsti na bhinnendriyayoḥ ṣaṇāṃ yugapadutpattiriti vacanāt |
SA15n1242:563: na ca tatra bhedenānupalabhyamānaṃ mānasaṃ nāstīti śakyate vaktuṃ samānajātīyanīlavikalpodayāt |
SA15n1242:564: yadi ca tanna mānasaṃ syāttatpṛṣṭhabhāvī nīlavikalpā ne syādeva |
SA15n1242:566: yathā deevadattena nīle gṛhīte na yajñadattasya nīlaniścayo bhavati |
SA15n1242:572: na ca vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi mānasasyotpattirasti na ca dvayornīlavijñānayorutpattirnirvikalpayordṛśyate anupalabhyamānatvāttayoḥ |
SA15n1242:575: yena bhinnasaṃtānānnirvikalpakādutpattirna syādekasaṃtānapātitvāttayoravaśyaṃ cāṅgīkartavyā vijātīyā vikalpasyotpattiryena vārtikakāra evamāha |
SA15n1242:579: tataśca tatsāmarthyabhāvi kathaṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ smaraṇaṃ vijātīyatvāt |
SA15n1242:580: na ca tatra mānasaṃ saṃviducyata indriyavijñānasya vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyasya cintyatvāt |
SA15n1242:581: kiṃ cendriyavijñānasya kathaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ yadi svavyāpāraṃ karoti |
SA15n1242:584: nanu cittacaittā iti vaktavye sarvagrahaṇasya vyāvartyābhāvādapārthakaṃ tadgrahaṇamityāha sukhādaya evetyādi |
SA15n1242:585: na kevalaṃ prasiddhāḥ sukhādayaḥ cittacaittā svasaṃvedanā gṛhyatte anye'
SA15n1242:589: evaṃ bruvatā ṭīkākṛtānena nirodhasamāpattyavasthāyāṃ śuddhacittābhāva evetyabhiprāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ tasyāmavasthāyāṃ na kāciccittāvasthā saṃvedyate yataḥ |
SA15n1242:590: nanu cittacaittā nāmātmasaṃvedanaṃ nāsti syātmani kāritvavirodhādityuktamityāha yena hītyādi |
SA15n1242:593: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśatayaṃ svanūpaṃ nivedayannātmaprakāśane na pradīpāttaramapekṣate tathā cittādikamapi saṃvidrūpatayā svanūpaṃ nivedayannātmasaṃvedane na jñānāttaramapekṣate |
SA15n1242:594: na ca svātmani kāritvavirodho yato vāstavakārakatvābhāvaḥ |
SA15n1242:596: tatrāpi nīlākārotpattireva prakāśakatvaṃ jñānasya pradīpasyāpi prāgbhāvitvameva |
SA15n1242:599: tataśca vijñānaṃ bodhanūpatayā pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ kathamapahnūyate bhavatā parokṣaṃ vijñānamiti |
SA15n1242:602: pi bāhyanūpāḥ sukhādaya iti manyate taṃ pratyāha iha ca nūpādo dṛśyamāna ityādi |
SA15n1242:604: nīlanūpātsātādikamantaraṃ saṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ na bāhyenābhinnanūpaṃ jaḍanūpaṃ ca śakyate vaktumiti |
SA15n1242:605: amumevārthaṃ na ca gṛhyamānākāra ityādinā darśayati |
SA15n1242:608: na ca nīlasya sātanūpatvamanugamyata iti tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā vikalpena sātanūpo nīlādirnānugamyata ityarthaḥ |
SA15n1242:609: tena nīlādiḥ sātasvabhāvo na pratyakṣasiddha iti sāṃkhyaṃ nirākurvatā grāhyagrāhakaṃ sātādinūpaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pradarśitam |
SA15n1242:610: tena yuktamuktaṃ keścit grāhyādbhinnaṃ grāhakaṃ na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyata iti tena kiṃcinnāma nāpahnutaṃ bhavatītyuktam |
SA15n1242:623: tadiha sphuṭābhatvārambhe tyādinopasaṃhāravyājena yogino manovijñānasyāvasthātrayaṃ darśayati |
SA15n1242:624: bhāvanāprakarṣāvasthekā prakarṣaparyantāvasthā dvitīyā bhāvyamānasya karatalāmalakavaddarśanaṃ yoginaḥ tṛtīyāvastheti |
SA15n1242:627: iti nyāyādyadyapi manojñānena bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajena śabdārthauo yugapadgṛhyete tathāpi dvayoḥ svanūpasya sannihitatayā gṛhyamāṇatvāttadgrāhi vijñānaṃ nirvikalpakamiti |
SA15n1242:628: nuna ca manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pratibhāsate yathā tathaiva bhāvyamānaṃ prakarṣaparyantajaṃ manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakapratibhāsi sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1242:630: pamityanaikāntiko heturiti paccoditaṃ pareṇa tatparihartumupakramate vikalpavijñānaṃ hītyādinā |
SA15n1242:632: yadyapi manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭapratibhāsi tathāpi sphuṭābhatvāvasthāyāṃ tadalīkākāraṃ vācyavācakanūpamapaiti vittinūpaṃ tu tasya nijam |
SA15n1242:633: atastadeva cidrūpaṃ jñānaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati na vācyavācakākāratayā tayorāropitanūpatvāt |
SA15n1242:634: āropitanūpagrahaṇasphuṭatvameva na syāditi nānaikāntikatvaṃ hetoḥ sphuṭābhatvādityasya |
SA15n1242:635: yadā tu vikalpavijñānaṃ śabdasaṃsargayogyavastu gṛhṇāti tadā saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena tadvastu gṛhṇāti |
SA15n1242:638: tacca pūrvavijñānaṃ saṃprati śabdasaṃsargayogyavastugrahaṇakāle nāsti kṣaṇikatvājjñānasya |
SA15n1242:639: tadvatpūrvavijñānaviṣayatvamapi saṃprati nāsti viṣayiṇo jñānasyābhāve viṣayasyāpyarthasya saṃketakālabhāvinojbhāva ityasaṃnihataṃ saṃketakālabhāvi tadvastvāropya gṛhṇadvikalpavijñānamasphuṭaṃ bhavatīti |
SA15n1242:642: tataḥ sphuṭatvānnirvikalpakaṃ yogijñānamabhrāntaṃ ca pramāṇena śuddhārthagrāhitvātsaṃvādakam |
SA15n1242:645: prakārabhedamiti pratyakṣaṃ sāmānyaṃ nirvikalpakamabhrāntaṃ tasya prakārabheda indriyajñānādiḥ |
SA15n1242:648: iha kaiścinmīmāṃsakādimiḥ pratyakṣasya sāmānyaviśeṣau dvāvapi viṣayau kalpitau |
SA15n1242:650: sāṃkhyena dvayorapi viśeṣo viṣaya iṣṭaḥ sāmānyasyābhāvāt |
SA15n1242:651: vedāntavādinā ca sāmānyameva viṣayo dvayoḥ ātmadvaitatayā sarvasyaikatvādviśeṣe bhrāntatvāddvayoriti vipratipattiḥ pratyakṣādiviṣaye |
SA15n1242:660: tatrāsādhāraṇatattvaṃ pratyakṣasya grāhyaviṣaya iti darśayati yadasādhāraṇamityādinā |
SA15n1242:661: nanu kimucyate grāhyaviṣaya iti yāvatā kimanyo viṣayo'
SA15n1242:664: yamadhyavasyatīti yaṃ saṃtānanūpeṇa sthitamarthaṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā vikalpena niścinoti |
SA15n1242:665: nanu ca kathaṃ pratyakṣasya saṃtāno viṣayo yato vikalpasyāsau viṣayaḥ |
SA15n1242:678: nanu pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya ityukte sāmānyamapi tasya viṣaya iti tadapi svalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti praśnaḥ |
SA15n1242:679: asaṃnidhānaṃ dūradeśāvasthānamiti bruvatā vinītadevasya vyākhyā dūṣitā |
SA15n1242:680: tena hyevaṃ vyākhyātaṃ sarveṇa nūpeṇa vastuno'
SA15n1242:683: etadasaṃgataṃ yasmādvastunaḥ tatrābhāve jñānameva na bhavati |
SA15n1242:689: nanu sāmānyameva dūre gṛhyamāṇamasphuṭapratibhāsaṃ na svalakṣaṇamityāha sarvāṇyevetyādi sāmānyasyāvidyamānatvādityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA15n1242:690: ataḥ tānyeva svalakṣaṇāni sphuṭāsphuṭapratibhāsīni na sāmānyam |
SA15n1242:691: nanu yadi dūrāsannābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ nūpadvayaṃ tasya syāt tataśca nikaṭasthitasya pratibhāsadvayaṃ syāt na ca niyamo dūre'
SA15n1242:693: ucyate na hi nīlaṃ vastu spaṣṭanūpamaspaṣṭaṃ ca api tu nīlaṃ sādhyārthakriyāsamarthaṃ nīlaparamāṇunūpam |
SA15n1242:695: yadā dūre nīlaṃ paśyati tadālokaparamāṇūnāṃ ca rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtatvātspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1242:696: nikaṭe tu ālokaparamāṇūnāṃ bahutvānna te rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtā iti spaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate |
SA15n1242:697: jñānasya spaṣṭādidvāreṇārthasya spaṣṭāspaṣṭanūpe bhavato na paramārthata iti |
SA15n1242:700: nanu tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇamityuktaṃ tatra yadi pratyakṣasyaiva viṣayo bhavati svalakṣaṇaṃ nānyasyeti tadānumānāderna svalakṣaṇaviṣayaḥ |
SA15n1242:703: tadānumānasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo na niṣiddha iti svalakṣaṇaviṣayamanumānaṃ syāditi manyamānaḥ pṛcchati |
SA15n1242:707: yadyapi vikalpasya viṣayo vastu na bhavati tathāpi sa eva svalakṣaṇaṃ dāhādyarthakriyānūpeṇa vyavasāyādityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA15n1242:710: na hāropabalādavastu vastu bhavati sarvasya śaśaviṣāṇādervastutvaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1242:714: idameva paramārthasattvaṃ nāma yaduta jñāne pratibhāsanam |
SA15n1242:715: sāmānyamapi jñāne pratibhāsate tadapi paramārtha saditi manyamānaḥ pṛcchati |
SA15n1242:718: tadayamartha ityādinā samudāyasya padānāṃ tātparyaṃ darśayati |
SA15n1242:723: na ca jñānajanakatvenārthakriyākāritvaṃ tasya jñānasya vināpi sāmānyena vāsanābalātsāmānyaviṣayasyotpatteriti |
SA15n1242:725: tathāhītyādinā pratyakṣaviṣayeṇa saha vikalpaviṣayasya sāmānyasya visadṛśatvaṃ darśayati |
SA15n1242:726: kathaṃ punarvikalpasya viṣayo bhavati sāmānyamityāha samāropyamāṇamiti sakalavahnisādhāraṇatayā sāmānyākārasya saṃvedyatvādityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA15n1242:727: so'numānasya viṣayo grāhyanūpa iti grāhyaṃ nūpamasyeti bahuvrīhiḥ |
SA15n1242:728: atrāpi grāhyāpekṣayā viṣayo vyavasthāpito na prāpyāpekṣayā tatrāvipratipatteḥ |
SA15n1242:729: nanu tatsāmānyamiti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ prastutya sa ityanena puṃtliṅgena parāmarśaḥ kathamityāha sarvanāmnetyādi |
SA15n1242:730: kasmātpunaḥ pratyakṣapariccheda anumānasya viṣayavipratipattirnirākṛtā vārtikakāreṇa nānumānapariccheda ityāha sāmānyalakṣaṇamityādi |
SA15n1242:733: numānasya viṣayo vyavasthāpyeta tadā tatraiva granthaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt |
SA15n1242:734: ko'sau vānumānasya viṣayaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayādanyaḥ pratyakṣasyaiva ko'
SA15n1242:735: sau viṣayo yadapekṣayāyamanyaḥ punarvaktavyaṃ svalakṣaṇamityevamāvartyamāne gauravaṃ syāt |
SA15n1242:739: tathāhi pramāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ pramitikriyāṃ vinā na bhavati yathā chittiṃ vinā na paraśuḥ |
SA15n1242:742: ato mīmāṃsakenendriyaṃ pramāṇamindriyārthasannikarṣaḥ manaindriyasannikarṣaḥ ātmamanaḥ sannikarṣaśceṣṭaḥ sarve sannikarṣāśceti | taduktam |
SA15n1242:744: manaso vendriyairyoga ātmanā sarva eva vā ||
SA15n1242:746: tadā jñānaṃ phalaṃ tatra vyāpārācca pramāṇatā |
SA15n1242:747: vyāpāro na yadā teṣāṃ tadā notpadyate phalamiti ||
SA15n1242:748: tathā pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ pramāṇamuttaramuttaraṃ phalamiti coktam |
SA15n1242:752: idaṃ tvadhikaṃ viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ viśeṣyajñānaṃ phalamiti yathoktaṃ kumārilena |
SA15n1242:757: kathaṃ punararthaparichittinūpaṃ pramāṇasya phalaṃ nārthapravartakādi vijñānamityāha arthasyetyādi |
SA15n1242:759: yena phalena niṣpannenānantareṇa pramāṇasya karaṇatvavyapadeśo bhavati tadeva phalaṃ nānyat |
SA15n1242:760: arthaparicchedakatvena vijñāna utpanne svaviṣayaniścayajanakatve sati samāpto jñānasya pramāṇavyāpāra iti |
SA15n1242:763: pramāṇādarthaparicchittinūpasya phalasya bhinnatvaṃ darśayituṃ pramāṇajñānasya svanūpaṃ prāgdarśitamapi punarapi darśayati prāpakaṃ jñānamityādinā |
SA15n1242:765: yasmātprāpakaṃ vijñānaṃ pramāṇamiṣṭamasmābhiḥ tasmātsā ca prāpaṇaśaktirathaparicchittireva nārthādutpattyādikamiti |
SA15n1242:768: yato bījādeḥ sakāśādaṅkurasyārthāvabhāsitvotpattirasti na ca bījādikaṃ prāpayati khalavilāntargatasyāpi bījasyāṅkurotpādakatvādityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA15n1242:769: tasmādityādinā jñānasyārthādutpattivyāpārādanya eva pramāṇavyāpāra iti darśayati |
SA15n1242:771: yadyevaṃ prāpaṇaśaktiḥ phalaṃ tarhi nārthaparicchittinūpaṃ phalam |
SA15n1242:773: yadeva prāpakaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva pravartakamarthapradarśakaṃ ca tadeveti purastātsaṃvarṇitaṃ pramāṇasvanūpacintāyām |
SA15n1242:774: tataścārthapradarśakameva prāpakaṃ tasya ca prāpaṇaśaktirarthaparicchittireva tāvatā parisamāptatvātpramāṇavyāpārasyeti sthitam |
SA15n1242:776: yadi jñānasya pramitinūpaṃ phalaṃ jñānāttarhi pramāṇena bhinnena bhavitavyamiti manyamānaḥ pṛcchati yadi tarhītyādinā |
SA15n1242:777: arthasānūpyamasya pramāṇamiti etasya vivaraṇaṃ arthena yatsānūpyamityādi |
SA15n1242:780: viṣayādutpadyamānaṃ viṣayasadṛśaṃ bhavatīti tadeva sānūpyaṃ sādṛśyamuktamiti darśayati iha yasmādityādinā nanu cetyādi |
SA15n1242:782: indriyādikaṃ pramāṇamuktamasmābhiḥ tadeva kiṃ bauddhenāpi neṣyate yenārthasānūpyaṃ pramāṇamiṣyate |
SA15n1242:784: ṅgīkriyamāṇe pramāṇaphalayoraikyānnaikaṃ karma karaṇaṃ bhavatīti yaccoditaṃ tattadavasthameveti |
SA15n1242:788: prakṛṣṭopakārakaṃ jñānasya sānūpyameva tadvaśādarthādhigatisiddheḥ nendriyādikaṃ arthasānūpyābhāve'
SA15n1242:792: nīlanirbhāsaṃ hītyādinā nīlākāraṃ nīlavijñānasya nīlāvagamavyavasthāyā nimittaṃ darśayati |
SA15n1242:793: yasmānnīlākāre vijñānasyāvagate nīlapratītiravagamyate tasmādarthākāraḥ pramāṇaṃ karaṇadharmatvādasyeti |
SA15n1242:797: kiṃ tu teṣāṃ sarvajñānotpattiṃ prati nimittatvānna pratiniyatārthavyavasthāpanasya nimittatvam |
SA15n1242:800: yattatpareṇa coditaṃ pramāṇaphalayoraikyānna caikaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ vā syāditi tatpariharati |
SA15n1242:802: syādayamekasya vastuno virodho yadyayaṃ janyajanakabhāvaḥ pramāṇaphalayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ kiṃ tarhi vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpakabhāvaḥ |
SA15n1242:806: tathā hi nīlākāre vijñāna utpanne viśiṣṭajñānaṃ vyavasthāpayanti nīlajñānamanubhūtamiti na jñānamutpādayati |
SA15n1242:808: nanu ca nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ viśiṣṭākāramutpannaṃ kathaṃ tasya samānakāla evāṃśaṃśitayā vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpakabhāvo bhavatīti manyamāna pṛcchati |
SA15n1242:812: na vijñānameva nirvikalpakamātmānaṃ vyavasthāpayati kiṃtu pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyate |
SA15n1242:813: tatra cārthākārasya vyavasthāpanahetutvamasānūpyavyāvṛttibhedenārthabodhatayā vyavasthāpyasyotpādena vedanasya tu vyavasthāpyatvam |
SA15n1242:816: nanu nīlajñānamutpannaṃ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣasiddhaṃ yadi niścayavaśātpramāṇavyavasthā labhyate tadā yujyate vaktuṃ niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyata iti yāvatā niścayapratyayaṃ vināpi pramāṇaṃ bhavatyevetyāha niścayapratyayenāvyavasthāpitamityādi darśayati |
SA15n1242:817: yāvatpratyakṣaṃ svaviṣaye svātmani niścayaṃ notpādayati na tāvatpramāṇaṃ bhavati ātmavyāpārānirvartanāt |
SA15n1242:819: nanu yadi niścayaṃ vinā pramāṇameva na bhavati pratyakṣaṃ vikalpasahitaṃ tarhi pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ syānna kevalaṃ tadanvayavyatirekāditi manyamānaścodayati yadyevamityādinā |
SA15n1242:821: uṃ niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyata iti yāvatā niścayapratyayaṃ vināpi pramāṇaṃ bhavatyevetyāha niścayapratyayenāvyavasthāpitamityādi darśayati |
SA15n1242:822: yāvatpratyakṣaṃ svaviṣaye svātmani niścayaṃ notpādayati na tāvatpramāṇaṃ bhavati ātmavyāpārānirvartanāt |
